duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing field testing of cellular connectivity for next-gen smartphones and devices, including regular travel to testing locations.
Communicating technical issues and demonstrating strong fundamental and judgment skills.
Analyzing testing data and making decisions without constant assistance.
Reporting back with data and describing technical problems.
Adapting quickly and being trainable in wireless domains (LTE, 5GNR) with fundamental knowledge.

education_certification.credential: 1–5 years of experience in cellular field testing or cellular QA testing, with a basic to good understanding of 5GNR and LTE protocol stack.
